notes.title: Conflicts of Interest
notes.p: The authors declare no potential conflict of interest. The funders had no role in the design of the study; in the collection, analyses or interpretation of the data; in the writing of the manuscript, or in the decision to publish the results. R.K. received speaker’s honoraria and travel support from Gilead Sciences, Roche, MSD, ViiV Healthcare, and Janssen-Cilag. A.So. received speaker’s honoraria and travel support from Gilead Sciences and ViiV Healthcare. M.Z. received speaker’s honoraria and travel support from Gilead Sciences, Janssen-Cilag, and ViiV Healthcare.
